title: Strengthening HR Management Competencies: Online Training for Knowledge Transfer Facilitation for Medical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-Level Medical Practice Knowledge and Clinical Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can utilize at least three knowledge conversion strategies suitable for their work environments
Learners can diagnose peers' knowledge gaps and develop customized learning support plans
Learners can demonstrate at least two performance improvements by applying learned content to actual clinical practice within six months of training

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
